law.catch_line: Consumer Complaints; Authority Of Department; Discipline Of Licensee

text.section: fraud or misrepresentation in obtaining a license;

criminal conduct which the department determines to be of such a nature as to render such person unfit to practice as a licensed alcohol and drug counselor as evidenced by criminal proceedings resulting in a conviction, guilty plea or plea of nolo contendere or an admission of sufficient facts;
violation of any rule or regulation of the department governing the practice of alcohol and drug counselors;
violation of ethical standards which the department determines to be of such a nature as to render such person unfit to practice as a licensed alcohol and drug counselor;
other just and sufficient cause which the department may determine would render a person unfit to practice as a licensed alcohol and drug counselor.
